channel.title: The Impromptu Artist
channel.description: A glance into the mind of a perpetual dreamer.

item.title: I'm back?
item.description:
Blog is up on Github!

I'm trying this out. Need to get the script issue worked out but I'm closer.

Edit: Got it worked out, now I need a background image...

Until next time.

item.title: Delay Incoming
item.description:
Quick update

Won't be posting for a bit because I'm still not sure if I want to pay the monthly fee for the Ghost blog hosting. There are options but it may take me a couple weeks to get set up.

See you then.

item.content:encoded:
Quick update

Won't be posting for a bit because I'm still not sure if I want to pay the monthly fee for the Ghost blog hosting. There are options but it may take me a couple weeks to get set up.

See you then.

item.title: On That Midnight Train to Georgia
item.description:
I've seen a sign.

Here it is:

Now, on to business...

It was a hell of a week. Aside from that, I got some cool pictures.

A friend of mine is making a train set, HO scale, and I find it to be quite interesting. Not only is it a
item.dc:creator: Mark Stringer
item.content:encoded:
I've seen a sign.

Here it is:

Now, on to business...

It was a hell of a week. Aside from that, I got some cool pictures.

A friend of mine is making a train set, HO scale, and I find it to be quite interesting. Not only is it a hobby of skill and detail, but also that of patience.

Less Talk, More Photos

and finally, my favorite.

These are just a few of the pictures, but it was an entertaining little detour during the middle of a hectic week to remind me that there's much more to life than work.

Until next time.

item.title: What to do? What to do.
item.description:
I make things difficult for myself.

I'm a perfectionist. It's what I do.

This new venture is no different. What should I use for a blog theme? Should I get a pre-made theme? Should I make my own?

Make my own, of course! - Mark Stringer 2016

Ah yes, the
item.dc:creator: Mark Stringer
item.content:encoded:
I make things difficult for myself.

I'm a perfectionist. It's what I do.

This new venture is no different. What should I use for a blog theme? Should I get a pre-made theme? Should I make my own?

Make my own, of course! - Mark Stringer 2016

Ah yes, the famous can-do attitude. Here comes the problem. If it's not perfect at first, it's not ever going to be good enough. We all know that's bullshit and yet here I am, stuck in the same cycle.

Enough.

It's not something I should do, it's something I can do.

Mom's are good for many things, not the least of which is motivation. Something she told me rings very true in making this blog. Telling myself I should do something is very different than telling myself I can do something.

Should creates guilt. Can creates options.

So what does that mean?

It means that I'm going to keep this default theme for a little bit while I make my own... and that's okay. Let's try something new for a change. Good enough will work for now and better will come soon. It always does.

Until next time.

item.title: Hello!
item.description:
My name is Mark Stringer and I am the Impromptu Artist. This is a work in progress blog that will be developed over time.

Stick around for a while!
item.dc:creator: Mark Stringer
